mapper.insert: insert into clazz(name, room, begin_date, end_date, master_id, subject, create_time, update_time) values (#{name}, #{room}, #{beginDate}, #{endDate}, #{masterId}, #{subject}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update: update clazz set name = #{name}, room = #{room}, begin_date = #{beginDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, master_id = #{masterId}, subject = #{subject} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, name, room, begin_date, end_date, clazz.master_id, clazz.subject, create_time, update_time from clazz where id = #{id};
